short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Xfish Ocean Explorers Guild uses social finance and blockchain for treasure quests

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "XFish" is an epic adventure story about TK, a determined fisherman who discovers uncharted seas, forms the Ocean Explorers Guild, and faces challenges like storms, pirates, and sea monsters in pursuit of treasures and glory. Along the way, they leverage social finance and blockchain technology to fund their expeditions and secure their newfound wealth.
